link.description: In the labyrinthine world of blockchain technology, it is normal to lose your bearings, to be swept away by the torrent of complex terms and intricate networks. How does one traverse this maze without losing sight of the core purpose of this technology? The answer lies not in distilling complexities into oversimplification but in using a relatable narrative to explore this technology. This is precisely where Connext steps in, introducing an innovative approach.
